text: Haunted Honeymoon is a 1986 American British horror comedy movie directed by Gene Wilder (who also stars) and also starring Gilda Radner, Dom DeLuise, Jonathan Pryce, Ann Way, Eve Ferret, Bryan Pringle, Matt Zimmerman, Roger Ashton-Griffiths. It was distributed by Orion Pictures and was a box office failure. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1986 horror movies Category:1986 comedy movies Category:American horror movies Category:American comedy movies Category:British horror movies Category:British comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Gene Wilder
title: Haunted Honeymoon
